backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature requirement for adding a subtitle to the EarthquakeDashboard hero section.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files including styles, configs, utilities, hooks, components, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme color variables and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading Leaflet assets and mounting the app root with updated favicon and title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the EarthquakeDashboard in a ThemeProvider with dark-mode defaults.
frontend/src/components/earthquake/Dashb: Displays total events, above-threshold count, and largest magnitude using styled summary cards.
frontend/src/components/earthquake/Earth: Modal dialog showing detailed earthquake info with optional moment tensor data fetched on demand.
Leaflet-based interactive map rendering earthquake markers filtered by bounds with debounced updates and click handling.
Displays a virtualized, selectable earthquake results table with magnitude, location, and metadata columns.
frontend/src/components/earthquake/FeedA: Provides UI controls for time window, magnitude, search filtering, and manual refresh of earthquake data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth provider and hook handling login, stored identity loading, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file noting that USGS data fetching is handled elsewhere.
frontend/src/hooks/useUsgsEarthquakes.ts: Fetches USGS earthquake feed data via React Query with periodic refetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useUsgsEventDetail.ts: Fetches and caches USGS event detail JSON using React Query with optional enabling.
frontend/src/hooks/useVirtualWindow.ts: Implements a lightweight virtualization algorithm computing visible item indices based on scrolling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, and Leaflet z‑index adjustments for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/earthquakeFilters.ts: Provides time, magnitude, text search filters, and sorting utilities for USGS earthquake features.
frontend/src/lib/earthquakeMapBounds.ts: Filters earthquakes to those within map bounds, handling padding and International Date Line wrapping.
frontend/src/lib/earthquakeStats.ts: Computes earthquake totals, count above a magnitude threshold, and finds the largest-magnitude feature.
frontend/src/lib/fetchJson.ts: Fetches JSON from a URL and throws an error for non‑OK HTTP responses.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides utilities to format timestamps, magnitudes, depths, and coordinates into user‑friendly strings.
frontend/src/lib/leafletTypes.ts: Defines minimal Leaflet TypeScript interfaces and a helper to create magnitude‑styled circle markers.
frontend/src/lib/mmi.ts: Converts numeric MMI values into Roman numerals and labels, with helpers for formatted strings and band lookup.
frontend/src/lib/usgsEventDetailTypes.ts: Type definitions for USGS event‑detail responses, including moment‑tensor product metadata.
frontend/src/lib/usgsFeeds.ts: Generates USGS feed URLs and provides basic magnitude labels and color categories.
frontend/src/lib/usgsTypes.ts: Defines core USGS GeoJSON feature and response types plus filter configuration interfaces.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, sets up React Query and Internet Identity provider, and renders the app.
frontend/src/pages/EarthquakeDashboard.t: Implements the main dashboard with filtering, view modes, data fetching, stats, and earthquake selection.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Describes project state, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented feature metadata.
